fn.p: Edited by: Luc Pieters, University of Antwerp, Belgium
Reviewed by: Christian W. Gruber, Medizinische Universität Wien, Austria; Juliana Montani Raimundo, Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro, Brazil; Liselotte Krenn, Universität Wien, Austria
†These authors have contributed equally to this work as first authors.
This article was submitted to Ethnopharmacology, a section of the journal Frontiers in Pharmacology
